de.unibox.model.database

Class CustomScriptRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unibox.model.database.CustomScriptRunner

  • public class CustomScriptRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    Tool to run database scripts. This version of the script can be found at https://gist.github.com/gists/831762/ EDITED: Replaced logWriter* with UniBox Logger.

        private void runScript(java.sql.Connection conn,

                throws java.io.IOException,
                       java.sql.SQLException
        Runs an SQL script (read in using the Reader parameter) using the connection passed in.
        Parameters:
        conn - - the connection to use for the script
        reader - - the source of the script
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading from the Reader
        java.sql.SQLException - if any SQL errors occur
